author: Fextralife
description:
Hades 2 Review - Better Than the Original?
In this Hades 2 review, we'll be taking an in-depth look at Supergiant's follow-up to the widely acclaimed title Hades, and answer whether it's worth your time and looking into. If you're a fan of the first game and want to know how the sequel stacks up, or if you're a new player looking to find out how the game is, watch on to find out.

https://hades2.wiki.fextralife.com/Hades+2+Wiki

0:00 - Hades 2 Review
0:16 - Story and Setting
2:24 - Gameplay
8:16 - Replayability and Length
9:32 - Visuals, Audio, and Performance
11:09 - Final Thoughts and Score

title: Hades 2 Review - Better Than the Original?
